Text: Thanks a million! I would've bought it, but I don't have a PayPal or anything. It'd be nice if TJ included a table of contents, but oh well. It's also kind of a pain in the dick to have all the documents in the same PDF file because it requires lots of scrolling, but fuck that too.
Thank you very much. I hate to pirate this, but I'm broke as fuck and this guy is genius.
Thanks a lot. I downloaded this, and plan to buy it if I like it.
